caption:
🚨Watch out for these 8 signs your rent is about to increase!⁠
⁠
1️⃣ Rents for similar apartments in your area are increasing.⁠
2️⃣ Your landlord starts discussing changes to your lease.⁠
3️⃣ Frequent upgrades and renovations are happening in the building.⁠
4️⃣ Property taxes or the cost of living is rising.⁠
5️⃣ There’s been a change in property ownership or management.⁠
6️⃣ Demand in your neighborhood is growing.⁠
7️⃣ Your landlord starts asking about your future plans.⁠
8️⃣ There’s a low availability of apartments in the area.⁠
⁠
If these sound familiar, it may be time to explore more affordable options!💡 ⁠
⁠
#SmartRenting #ExploreYourOptions #PadSplit #Coliving⁠
